name: Deployment of two tier application.
desc: Built Kubernetes Cluster on AWS from Scratch with Minikube.Setup and Managed Docker Containers for Python-flask app and MySQL into Kubernetes Managed Deployment Replication Auto healing and Auto scaling for Kubernetes Cluster.

name: Deployment of Chat-GPT application.
desc: Implemented a Continuous integration/continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for a React application enabling automated build, and deployment process upon code push. Implemented Github-Webhook, when a new commit happens a new build will be built and it will be reflected on the server.

name: Infrastructure as a Tool
desc: Created infrastructure templates using Terraform to provision AWS resources. Automated the provisioning of EC2 instances, VPCs, and security groups.
